name: Tushar
headline: Hi, it's me Tushar
tagline: I am a Software Developer & Data Enthusiast

services.service_desc: In exploring the software development field, I came across web development. I started learning from online resources and eventually gained experience by working on university websites. I also took part in many hackathons.

I had a keen interest in microcontrollers, so I learned from a course floated by our institute. I gained exposure to IoT usage in various domains and applied my learning in building an end-to-end project in a team of four.

Exploring and analyzing the new technologies coming that could be real game-changers has been my favorite thing to surf on the internet. I am the Software Community coordinator and a senior member of a consulting program run across the university, where we discuss new developments in tech.

Performing computational statistical analysis on any given dataset caught my attention. I explored this area by solving datasets from Kaggle and then participating in various competitions. My team was runner-up in a flagship event organized by IIM - Bangalore.

Playing with pictures, editing, and making memes was my favorite pastime during my high school years. I learned various photo editing tools for it. I was the Student Coordinator for the Media Team of the institute's Placement Cell and a member of the Poster Team of Zeitgeist Fest.
